long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome webstore version of the popular game, 8Ball Pool!

A fun game that plays in a popup

This chrome extension allows you to play your favorite arcade game, anytime, anywhere! Just click on the 8Ball icon in the top right corner of your browser, and start playing! If you loved pool, you'll love this game.
